verses.verse: And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> to the <S%H7462>shepherds;<s%> <S%H1945>Woe<s%> be to the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that do <S%H7462>feed<s%> themselves! should not the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> <S%H7462>feed<s%> the <S%H6629>flocks?<s%>

You <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H2459>fat,<s%> and you <S%H3847>clothe<s%> you with the <S%H6785>wool,<s%> you <S%H2076>kill<s%> them that are <S%H1277>fed:<s%> but you <S%H7462>feed<s%> not the <S%H6629>flock.<s%>

The <S%H2456>diseased<s%> have you not <S%H2388>strengthened,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> have you <S%H7495>healed<s%> that which was <S%H2470>sick,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> have you <S%H2280>bound<s%> up that which was <S%H7665>broken,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> have you <S%H7725>brought<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> that which was <S%H5080>driven<s%> away, <S%H3808>neither<s%> have you <S%H1245>sought<s%> that which was <S%H6>lost;<s%> but with <S%H2394>force<s%> and with <S%H6531>cruelty<s%> have you <S%H7287>ruled<s%> them.

And they were <S%H6327>scattered,<s%> because there is <S%H1097>no<s%> <S%H7462>shepherd:<s%> and they <S%H1961>became<s%> <S%H402>meat<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> when they were <S%H6327>scattered.<s%>

My <S%H6629>sheep<s%> <S%H7686>wandered<s%> through <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and on <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H1389>hill:<s%> yes, my <S%H6629>flock<s%> was <S%H6327>scattered<s%> on <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H369>none<s%> did <S%H1875>search<s%> or <S%H1245>seek<s%> after them.
<S%H3651>Therefore,<s%> you <S%H7462>shepherds,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%>

As I <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> <S%H518>surely<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3282>because<s%> my <S%H6629>flock<s%> <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H957>prey,<s%> and my <S%H6629>flock<s%> <S%H1961>became<s%> <S%H402>meat<s%> to <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> because there was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7462>shepherd,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> did my <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> <S%H1875>search<s%> for my <S%H6629>flock,<s%> but the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> <S%H7462>fed<s%> themselves, and <S%H7462>fed<s%> not my <S%H6629>flock;<s%>
<S%H3651>Therefore,<s%> O you <S%H7462>shepherds,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I am <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H7462>shepherds;<s%> and I will <S%H1875>require<s%> my <S%H6629>flock<s%> at their <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and cause them to <S%H7673>cease<s%> from <S%H7462>feeding<s%> the <S%H6629>flock;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> <S%H7462>feed<s%> <S%H853>themselves<s%> any <S%H5750>more;<s%> for I will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> my <S%H6629>flock<s%> from their <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> that they may not be <S%H402>meat<s%> for them.
For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I, even I, will both <S%H1875>search<s%> my <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> and <S%H1239>seek<s%> them out.

As a <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> <S%H1243>seeks<s%> out his <S%H5739>flock<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he is <S%H8432>among<s%> his <S%H6629>sheep<s%> that are <S%H6566>scattered;<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> will I <S%H1239>seek<s%> out my <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> and will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> them out of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4725>places<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> they have been <S%H6327>scattered<s%> in the <S%H6051>cloudy<s%> and <S%H6205>dark<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And I will <S%H3318>bring<s%> them out from the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H6908>gather<s%> them from the <S%H776>countries,<s%> and will <S%H935>bring<s%> them to their own <S%H127>land,<s%> and <S%H7462>feed<s%> them on the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by the <S%H650>rivers,<s%> and in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4186>inhabited<s%> places of the <S%H776>country.<s%>

I will <S%H7462>feed<s%> them in a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H4829>pasture,<s%> and on the <S%H4791>high<s%> <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall their <S%H5116>fold<s%> be: <S%H8033>there<s%> shall they <S%H7257>lie<s%> in a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H5116>fold,<s%> and in a <S%H8082>fat<s%> <S%H4829>pasture<s%> shall they <S%H7462>feed<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
I will <S%H7462>feed<s%> my <S%H6629>flock,<s%> and I will cause them to <S%H7257>lie<s%> <S%H7901>down,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

I will <S%H1245>seek<s%> that which was <S%H6>lost,<s%> and <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> that which was <S%H5080>driven<s%> away, and will <S%H2280>bind<s%> up that which was <S%H7665>broken,<s%> and will <S%H2388>strengthen<s%> that which was <S%H2470>sick:<s%> but I will <S%H8045>destroy<s%> the <S%H8082>fat<s%> and the <S%H2389>strong;<s%> I will <S%H7462>feed<s%> them with <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>

And as for you, O my <S%H6629>flock,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H7716>cattle<s%> and <S%H7716>cattle,<s%> between the <S%H352>rams<s%> and the he <S%H6260>goats.<s%>

Seems it a <S%H4592>small<s%> thing to you to have <S%H7462>eaten<s%> up the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H4829>pasture,<s%> but you must <S%H7429>tread<s%> down with your <S%H7272>feet<s%> the <S%H3499>residue<s%> of your <S%H4829>pastures?<s%> and to have <S%H8354>drunk<s%> of the <S%H4950>deep<s%> <S%H4325>waters,<s%> but you must <S%H7515>foul<s%> the <S%H3498>residue<s%> with your <S%H7272>feet?<s%>

And as for my <S%H6629>flock,<s%> they <S%H7462>eat<s%> that which you have <S%H7429>trodden<s%> with your <S%H7272>feet;<s%> and they <S%H8354>drink<s%> that which you have <S%H4833>fouled<s%> with your <S%H7272>feet.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> to them; <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I, even I, will <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H1277>fat<s%> <S%H7716>cattle<s%> and <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H7330>lean<s%> <S%H7716>cattle.<s%>

<S%H3282>Because<s%> you have <S%H1920>thrust<s%> with <S%H6654>side<s%> and with <S%H3802>shoulder,<s%> and <S%H5055>pushed<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2456>diseased<s%> with your <S%H7161>horns,<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> you have <S%H6327>scattered<s%> them <S%H2351>abroad;<s%>

Therefore will I <S%H3467>save<s%> my <S%H6629>flock,<s%> and they shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> be a <S%H957>prey;<s%> and I will <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H7716>cattle<s%> and <S%H7716>cattle.<s%>

And I will <S%H6965>set<s%> up <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them, and he shall <S%H7462>feed<s%> them, <S%H853>even<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David;<s%> he shall <S%H7462>feed<s%> them, and he shall be their <S%H7462>shepherd.<s%>

And I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will be their <S%H430>God,<s%> and my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> a <S%H5387>prince<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them; I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it.

And I will <S%H3772>make<s%> with them a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H7965>peace,<s%> and will cause the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H2416>beasts<s%> to <S%H7673>cease<s%> out of the <S%H776>land:<s%> and they shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H983>safely<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H3462>sleep<s%> in the <S%H3264>woods.<s%>

And I will <S%H5414>make<s%> them and the places <S%H5439>round<s%> about my <S%H1389>hill<s%> a <S%H1293>blessing;<s%> and I will cause the <S%H1653>shower<s%> to <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> in his <S%H6256>season;<s%> there shall be <S%H1653>showers<s%> of <S%H1293>blessing.<s%>

And the <S%H6086>tree<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall <S%H5414>yield<s%> her <S%H6529>fruit,<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H5414>yield<s%> her <S%H2981>increase,<s%> and they shall be <S%H983>safe<s%> in their <S%H127>land,<s%> and shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> when I have <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H4133>bands<s%> of their <S%H5923>yoke,<s%> and <S%H5337>delivered<s%> them out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of those that <S%H5647>served<s%> themselves of them.

And they shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> be a <S%H957>prey<s%> to the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall the <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H398>devour<s%> them; but they shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H983>safely,<s%> and <S%H369>none<s%> shall make them <S%H2729>afraid.<s%>

And I will <S%H6965>raise<s%> up for them a <S%H4302>plant<s%> of <S%H8034>renown,<s%> and they shall be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H622>consumed<s%> with <S%H7457>hunger<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H3639>shame<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> any <S%H5750>more.<s%>

Thus shall they <S%H3045>know<s%> that I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%> am with them, and that they, even the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> are my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>
And you my <S%H6629>flock,<s%> the <S%H6629>flock<s%> of my <S%H4830>pasture,<s%> are <S%H120>men,<s%> and I am your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>
